title.rendered: SKALL STUDIO AW24 during Copenhagen Fashion Week

content.rendered:
SKALL STUDIO Fall-Winter 2024 COLLECTION at Copenhagen Fashion Week

The sisters grew up in the coastal area of Northern Jutland, surrounded by nature. A background that plays a great role in their approach to design and use of natural materials such as Danish wool, linen, organic cotton, and recycled cashmere.

With a vegan lifestyle, no use of skin and fur in the collections and a general conscious approach to design and development, Skall Studio has created a universe of effortless, elegant, and feminine styles made to last.

Skall Studio is known for their Danish signature knitwear, spun from Danish wool in one of the few remaining spinning mills in Denmark and afterwards knitted in one of the few remaining knitting factories in Denmark. A way to support craftsmanship and local production and to ensure transparency in the supply chain. Skall Studio is GOTS certified.

With a conscious approach to all aspects of the production and the people involved, fur and leather free collections and styles in natural materials made to last season after season as well as a heart for craftsmanship, Skall Studio is known as a value-based brand, striving for a better fashion industry.

Skall Studio has increased its focus on recycled materials and mono fibers - 98 % of the AW23 collection is made in mono fibers.

The brand has a heart for craftsmanship - from their Danish signature knitwear, sourced and made in Denmark, to their collaboration with local weavers in India. As craftsmanship will always be essential to the Skall sisters - in Denmark as well as in the rest of the world.

Skall Studio has two main collections a year and is GOTS certified.

Runway Looks

Photo: Press Skall Studio

More on: @skallstudio


By Senior Fashion Editor 24FashionTV: Christina V Henningstad @christina_henningstad
